text: Neil McCarthy (May 18, 1939 â€“ September 18, 2021) was an American college basketball coach. He was head coach of the Weber State Wildcats team from 1974 to 1985 and at the New Mexico State Aggies from 1985 to 1997. McCarthy died at his home in Salt Lake City, Utah on September 18, 2021 at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Sportspeople from San Francisco Category:College basketball coaches Category:Sportspeople from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:Sportspeople from New Mexico Category:People from Las Cruces, New Mexico
title: Neil McCarthy (basketball)
